analyzer.title: Paste Build Log
analyzer.description: Copy your Docker build output and paste it below for analysis
analyzer.placeholder:
Paste your Docker build log here...

Example:
#30 50.69 Error: Cannot find module @rollup/rollup-linux-arm64-musl
#30 ERROR: process '/bin/sh -c npm run build' did not complete successfully: exit code: 1
analyzer.emptyLogError: Please paste a Docker build log first
analyzer.noErrorsToast: No errors detected in the log

knowledge.title: Search Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Browse common Docker build errors and their solutions
knowledge.noResults: No results found for "{{query}}". Try different keywords.
